product_name: University Games Outfitters Best Dice Games
long_description: For on-the-road family fun, bring this set that includes a whopping 20 dice games including Hooligan, Yacht, Outfitters, Fark, Chicago, Drop Dead, Bowling Dice and other classics.
short_description: For on-the-road family fun, bring this set that includes a whopping 20 dice games including Hooligan, Yacht, Outfitters, Fark, Chicago, Drop Dead, Bowling Dice and other classics.
